summary: This mod mutes all player\'s combat grunting: on being hit, on attack, on power attack, on bash. NPSs not affected.
descriptionHtml:
Now Dragonborn fights silently. No moans, grunts, sqweaking any more.

Attacks, power attacks, bashing are performed without a sound. Dragonborn stoically endures pain and takes enemy hits silently.

This is done by adding a condition [NOT PLAYER] to all combat related generic exclamations like \"Arrgghh!\".

As per request: added another version with only attack and power attack grunts muted.

Installation: copy the  .esp and turn it on.
Uninstallation: turn off the .esp and delete it.
author: igli

files.name: Silenced attack and power attack only
files.fileName: Silenced attack and power attack only-41016-1-0.7z
